resources.string: With contributions by Thomas Hirsch and Jonas Graudums
Based on the Geohashing algorithm by Randall Munroe
Featuring some images built with the assistance of Roman Nurik\'s Android Asset Studio ( https://romannurik.github.io/AndroidAssetStudio/index.html )

Geohash Droid comes with no warranty or guarantees. Always use common sense and obey local laws, international laws, etiquette laws, and the laws of physics when attempting to go to hash points. Be kind, be courteous, and be safe.
